module.title: aon
module.p: aon is a cardinal numeral meaning one.

When followed by a temporal unit noun (e.g. latha day, madainn morning, feasgar afternoon, evening, oidhche night, samhradh summer), aon can be used to introduce a temporal adverbial marking a new temporal reference point in a narrative – aon latha chunnaic Màiri cù ruadh anns a’ ghàradh one day Mary saw a ginger dog in the garden
